conbody.p: Batch ingest of data is extremely fast. You configure a secure FTP or an SSH connection to allow a system to write data to a temporary landing space within . will help you get this set up.

You can trigger the bulk ingest process remotely or you can use a scheduled task such as a cron job. Triggering the process launches a MapReduce job that inserts the bulk data into at a very fast rate. The temporary files are then purged from the system.
